com.mrminecreep.jarock.event

Class EventRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mrminecreep.jarock.event.EventRegistry

  • public class EventRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Registry for events implementing Event.
    To register an event call registerEvent(Class),
    after that event listeners (as described in EventHandler) can be added.
    To unregister an event call unregisterEvent(Class),
    after that the specified event fired by EventConstructor will not be working.
    Author:
    MrMinecreep

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EventRegistry.EventRegistrySec
      Class used as a "key" for function calls that can only be executed by the EventRegistry class.
